alert.note: Alert for Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 10 at 2:17AM PST until March 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph, shifting to west with passage of a cold front. Locally higher gusts in the mountains. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold frontal passage expected in the Treasure Valley between 10 AM and noon MST, and in south- central Idaho between noon and 3 PM MST.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
